summary: A champion college quizzing team try to win the all-India finals and lose their virginities.
cast: Shashank Arora|Tanmay Dhanania|Chaitanya Varad|Vaishwath Shankar|Sindhu Sreenivasa Murthy|Subholina Sen|Anula Navlekar|Sid Mallya|Denzil Smith|Biswa Kalyan Rath|Shataf Figar|Kartik Iyer|Anisa Butt|Amrusha Palchaudhuri|Disha Raychaudhuri|Tanaya Saigal|Mounanjali Balraj|Kanchan Bhattacharya|Naresh Narasimhan|Giridharan|Anirudh Acharya|Falah Faisal|Ashok Mandanna|Devansh Mathur|Subhojit Sen
title: Brahman Naman
